announcements.title: New Feature: 3D Visualization
announcements.content:
Atlas Aligner v2.5 Released!

We're excited to announce 3D visualization support for your atlas alignments.

  • Interactive 3D viewer
  • Enhanced performance
  • Better accuracy

Check the documentation for more details.
